features.featureDescription: Data plane actions support authentication using managed identities.
features.featureGuidance: Use managed identities for Azure resources to run code in Azure Container Instances that interacts with other Azure services - without maintaining any secrets or credentials in code. The feature provides an Azure Container Instances deployment with an automatically managed identity in Azure Active Directory.
features.customerActionsDescription: Manage application identities securely and automatically
